posts.post_content:
Use in a [Zedruu the Greathearted](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Zedruu the Greathearted) EDH to cheat [Omniscience](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Omniscience) into play, in order to [Enter the Infinite](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Enter the Infinite), tap into the [Leyline of Anticipation](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Leyline of Anticipation), and take refuge in your [Island Sanctuary](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Island Sanctuary). Then put [Graceful Adept](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Graceful Adept) and [Tamiyo, the Moon Sage](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Tamiyo, the Moon Sage) into play and work your way to Tamiyo's emblem, countering any attempts to remove either of them. After you have it, [pull all your stuff from eternity](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=106657), drop a [Paradigm Shift](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Paradigm Shift) and [Ponder](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Ponder) for a bit.  
  
You are now a god, free to [Donate](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Donate) and [Brand](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?name=Brand) as you see fit. And there are so [many](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=370453) [ways](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=45263) [to](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=4729) [give](/Pages/Card/Details.aspx?multiverseid=184609) oth... [(see all)](javascript:void(0);)
